meanings.definition: Having a shiny or reflective surface.
meanings.sent1: The car's paint was the glossiest in the whole parking lot.
meanings.sent2: Her hair looked the glossiest under the bright lights.
meanings.sent3: The glossiest shoes in the store caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The glossiest marble floor reflected the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The glossiest diamond sparkled like a tiny star on her finger.

meanings.sent1: This magazine cover is the glossiest one I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The glossiest paper made the flyer stand out among the rest.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat's fur was the glossiest in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The glossiest finish on the furniture made it look brand new.
meanings.sent5: The glossiest apple in the bunch was saved for last.
